ygData.subject: Re: root
ygData.msgSnippet: According to GZ, the Root line is too powerful in groups, so it s been nerfed to the point of total uselessness for solo ers. Personally, I think he s smoking
ygData.messageBody:
According to GZ, the Root line is too powerful in
groups, so it's been nerfed to the point of total
uselessness for solo'ers.

Personally, I think he's smoking something really
nasty. That's the first spell I forget when I join a
group. (Depending on the group composition and where
we're hunting, I might replace it with Enstill, but
not often).

--- Lim Dul <sevendegrees@...> wrote:

<HR>
<html><table><tr><td><pre>
From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>

I heard rumours that they made root less effective for
us in this last patch
in an effort to make PVP servers more balanced. Any
truth to this? That
would definitely suck! All the more reason to group
now then ever.

-- Lim'Dul
28th Veeshan (one more level till we fly the Lim'Dul
skies)
</pre><!-- ONElist --></td></tr></table><hr><center><a
href="http://adforce.imgis.com/?adlink|2.0|2|82170|3238|1|ADFORCE;loc=300;"
target=_top><img
